We found this place based on the Yelp reviews. I agree with most comments!  Very good food, extremely inexpensive, great service, kinda skeptical based on the neighborhood but it was worth it in the end. We had two meals for less than 19 euro with coffee and dessert.  I liked that you could see the cook making the food and that it was cozy and clean. The gal at the front counter spoke English and took her time explaining the menu, which was very helpful.  I enjoyed my ravioli which was the special of the day. Their pesto sauce was red, which was interesting. I would go their again for sure!!!!
